page.title: 16Religion
page.content: There is only one church in our area now. That is the Anglican Church at Alwinton.It is part of the parish of Alwinton with Holystone, and the Vicar,residing in the Vicarage at Alwinton, is also priest at Alnham Church. The United Reform Church closed in 1981. It had previously been a Presbyterian Church in the Scottish tradition, and had been in the existing church building since 1854.Members now worship in their churh at Thropton. There is a Roman Catholic chapel at Biddlestone,but it is not now used.Their nearest church is at Thropton. There is also a Plymouth Bretheren Meeting Room in Thropton.
